name: Bondi Beach
description: One of the world's most famous beaches, perfect for surf and sun.

name: Whitehaven Beach
description: Crystal clear waters and white sands await you at Whitehaven Beach.

name: Angkor Wat
description: The largest religious monument in the world.

name: Wat Pho
description: Famous for its giant reclining Buddha.

name: Santorini
